short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your screenshots instantly to Google Drive. A link to the screenshot is saved to your clipboard allowing you to quickly share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your screenshots instantly to Google Drive. A link to the screenshot is saved to your clipboard allowing you to quickly share.
Save your screenshots instantly to Google Drive. A link to the screenshot is saved to your clipboard allowing you to quickly share the screenshot.

Teachers: Screenshots can contain sensitive student data. QuickShare Screenshot only saves the screenshot to YOUR Google Drive. It is important to be able to give students fast feedback. QuickShare Screenshot allows you to quickly give feedback to students. A short URL is automatically copied to your clipboard. Paste the URL into the private comments in Google Classroom or other places you give students feedback.

Tip: Find the QuickShare folder in Google Drive. Change the sharing settings to "Anyone with the link can view." This is a one-time thing to do. This allows the screenshots you share to be viewed.
